meanings.definition: Covered with a slimy or sticky substance.
meanings.sent1: The glairy surface of the pond reflected the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The glairy film on the window obscured the view outside.
meanings.sent3: The glairy coating on the fruit made it look unappetizing.
meanings.sent4: Her shoes became glairy after walking through the marsh.
meanings.sent5: The glairy layer on the leaves made them appear shiny and wet.
